segments.text: Hello . May I speak to Mary , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hi , Tom . How've you been ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just fine . I say . Aren't you busy tomorrow evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Uh-huh ... no , I guess I'll be free .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , uh ... why not dine out together and go to the movies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I'll pick you up at 6:00 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for inviting me . See you then . Bye , Tom .
segments.speaker: S2
